# displayName

**Instance Property**

The person’s formatted name.

## Declaration

```swift
var displayName: String { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains the name components specified at initialization time. Use the information in this property or the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPerson/nameComponents] property to identify the name of the user.

## Accessing the name

- **nameComponents**: The individual components of the person’s full name.

items.description: The individual components of the person’s full name.
items.name: nameComponents
